definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: Bend at the knee when you ski downhill.
sentences.chinese: 你从山上往下滑雪时，要屈着膝。

sentences.english: To prevent avalanches , Park Rangers and Ski Slope managers do what?
sentences.chinese: 为了防止雪崩，公园看守者们和滑雪场经理们做什么？

sentences.english: I like winter best because we can make snowmen and go skiing.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天，因为我们能做雪人和去滑雪。

sentences.english: Thanks for viewing and the support. Did you mean skiing or Vietnamese pho?
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的观看与支持，你是指滑雪还是越南河粉？

sentences.english: he was skilful at sketching. Suddenly, Abe suggested to go skiing.
sentences.chinese: 他素描画得很娴熟，突然，艾贝提议去滑雪。

sentences.english: Megeve ski station started its season early thanks to the recent snowfalls.
sentences.chinese: 最近的降雪已拉开了梅杰夫滑雪站的赛季。

sentences.english: A ski jump in Innsbruck, Austria.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚因斯布鲁克的一个滑雪跳台。

sentences.english: I'll have the express delivery service send my ski.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪板用快递寄过去吧。

sentences.english: Don't take foolish liberties on the ski slopes.
sentences.chinese: 不要在滑雪坡道上作愚蠢地冒险。

sentences.english: Fiberglass skis in the snow for any snow quality, but the price is higher.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃纤维滑雪板适合任何雪质的雪地，但价格较高。

sentences.english: Selling my snowboarding gear was a liberating experience.
sentences.chinese: 卖掉我的滑雪装置是一次解放性的经验。

sentences.english: It also serves as one of the training bases for China`s national skiing team.
sentences.chinese: 同时，它也是中国国家滑雪队的训练基地之一。

sentences.english: Cimmaron . This ski run has a giant slalom feel to it with good reason.
sentences.chinese: 这个滑雪场运行有大回转的感觉是很有道理的。

sentences.english: In the winter we ski and skate.

definition: skating or ice rink/ice stadium/ice arena
to soak in a spa or hot spring
